headline: Infleqtion Appoints Karl Pendergast as Senior Vice President and General Manager of Quantum Sensing Solutions
summary: BOULDER, Colo., December 08, 2025--Infleqtion (the "Company"), a global leader in neutral atom-based quantum technology, announced the appointment of Karl Pendergast as Senior Vice President and General Manager of its Quantum Sensing Solutions Group. Pendergast brings nearly four decades of experience in aerospace and defense, with a proven track record of driving strategic growth and operational excellence across civil, defense and commercial markets. headline: Lockheed Martin Stock Falls 6% in Six Months: What Should You Do?
summary: LMT's shares lag as labor shortages and program losses weigh on results, even as major defense wins and a hefty backlog support long-term growth.
